restaurant.description: The name of the fast food restaurant

value_dict.Mcdonalds: The fast food restaurant is Mcdonalds
value_dict.Chick Fil-A: The fast food restaurant is Chick Fil-A
value_dict.Sonic: The fast food restaurant is Sonic
value_dict.Arbys: The fast food restaurant is Arbys
value_dict.Burger King: The fast food restaurant is Burger King
value_dict.Dairy Queen: The fast food restaurant is Dairy Queen
value_dict.Subway: The fast food restaurant is Subway
value_dict.Taco Bell: The fast food restaurant is Taco Bell

item.description: The name of the food item

calories.description: The amount of calories in the food item (in kcal)

cal_fat.description: The amount of calories from fat in the food item (in kcal)

total_fat.description: The total amount of fat in the food item (in g)

sat_fat.description: The amount of saturated fat in the food item (in g)

trans_fat.description: The amount of trans fat in the food item (in g)

cholesterol.description: The amount of cholesterol in the food item (in mg)

sodium.description: The amount of sodium in the food item (in mg)

total_carb.description: The total amount of carbohydrates in the food item (in g)

fiber.description: The amount of dietary fiber in the food item (in g)

sugar.description: The amount of sugar in the food item (in g)

protein.description: The amount of protein in the food item (in g)

vit_a.description: The amount of vitamin A in the food item (in % daily value)

vit_c.description: The amount of vitamin C in the food item (in % daily value)

calcium.description: The amount of calcium in the food item (in % daily value)

salad.description: The category of the food item (salad or other)

value_dict.Other: The food item is not a salad

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in nutritional analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the fast food item, please predict the calorie content.

prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the fast food item, please predict the total fat content.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted total fat content is ____.

prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the fast food item, please predict the sodium content.
